title: IT'S THAT TIME OF THE YEAR AGAIN ! HAPPY HALLOWEEN EVERYONE !

embed.description: Tim Burton's 'The Nighmare Before Christmas' re-cut with Marilyn Manson's version of 'This Is Halloween' for the re-release of the film in Disney Digital 3-D and 2-Disc Special Edition Soundtrack.

body:
{{champion:56}} :Boys and girls of every age
Wouldn't you like to see something strange?

{{champion:35}} :Come with us and you will see
This, our town of Halloween

{{champion:56}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:35}} :
This is Halloween, this is Halloween
Pumpkins scream in the dead of night

{{champion:429}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:412}}  :
This is Halloween, everybody make a scene
Trick or treat till the neighbors gonna die of
fright
It's our town, everybody scream
In this town of Halloween

{{champion:412}} :I am the one hiding under your bed
Teeth ground sharp and eyes glowing red

{{champion:60}} :I am the one hiding under your stairs
Fingers like snakes and spiders in my hair

{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}} :
This is Halloween, this is Halloween
Halloween! Halloween! Halloween! Halloween!

{{champion:8}} {{champion:103}}  {{champion:28}} :
In this town we call home
Everyone hail to the pumpkin song

{{champion:82}} :
In this town, don't we love it now?
Everybody's waiting for the next surprise

{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}}
Round that corner, man hiding in the trash can
Something's waiting now to pounce, and how
you'll scream

{{champion:61}}  {{champion:19}} {{champion:154}} :
Scream! This is Halloween
Red 'n' black, slimy green

{{champion:19}} :Aren't you scared?

{{champion:7}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:18}} :
Well, that's just fine
Say it once, say it twice
Take the chance and roll the dice
Ride with the moon in the dead of night

{{champion:57}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:143}} :
Everybody scream, everybody scream

{{champion:223}} :In our town of Halloween

{{champion:35}} :
I am the clown with the tear-away face
Here in a flash and gone without a trace

{{champion:28}} :I am the "who" when you call, "Who's there?"
I am the wind blowing through your hair

{{champion:56}} :I am the shadow on the moon at night
Filling your dreams to the brim with fright

{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}} :
This is Halloween, this is Halloween
Halloween! Halloween! Halloween! Halloween!

{{champion:1}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:17}} :
Tender lump lings everywhere
Life's no fun without a good scare

{{champion:31}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:120}} :
That's our job, but we're not mean
in our town of Halloween

{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}}:
In this town

{{champion:82}} :Don't we love it now?


{{champion:82}}{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}}:
Everyone's waiting for the next surprise

{{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:202}}:
Skeleton Jack might catch you in the back
And scream like a banshee
Make you jump out of your skin
This is Halloween, everybody scream
Won't ya please make way for a very special
guy
Our man jack is king of the pumpkin patch
Everyone hail to the Pumpkin King now

EVERYONE:
This is Halloween, this is Halloween
Halloween! Halloween! Halloween! Halloween!

{{champion:1}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:17}}:
In this town we call home
Everyone hail to the pumpkin song

EVERYONE
La, la, la, la-la la, la, la, la-la la, la, la, la-la la, la-la la, Wheeeeeee!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

{{champion:202}} : Did you guys like our musical? I prepared it myself.
{{champion:497}} : LOVED IT !
{{champion:119}} : Needs more Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven.
{{champion:498}} :Cringe.
{{champion:164}} : Xayah dear, you are the literal definition of "cringe" everytime you open your mouth.
{{champion:498}} :Say that again in my face scissor legs!
{{champion:37}} :...
{{champion:136}} :Amusing, this planet gets to live another day. I like what you got.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________
{{sticker:vlad-salute}} {{sticker:vayne-pose}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

HAPPY HALLOWEEN EVERYONE!!!!!!
